SELECT noticeIdx , noticeTitle , noticeContent , noticeWriteDate FROM notice

SELECT q.qnaIdx , q.qnaTitle , q.qnaContent , q.qnaCategory , c.qnaCateSubject FROM qna q JOIN qnaCate c ON q.qnaCategory = c.qnaCateIdx
WHERE q.qnaIdx = #{qnaIdx}

SELECT myQuestion_num , myQuestion_id , myQuestion_subject , myQuestion_content , myQuestion_answer , myQuestion_status , myQuestion_date FROM myQuestion
WHERE myQuestion_num = #{myQuestion_num}

SELECT event_idx , event_title , event_startDt , event_endDt , event_poster FROM event
WHERE event_idx = #{event_idx}
